item.title: Registry name format
item.description: Q: When doing a docker push or when pulling an image, how does Docker determine if there is a registry server in the image name or if it is a path/username on the default registry (e.g. Docker Hub)? A: The hostname must contain a . dns separator or a : port separator before the first /, otherwise the code assumes you want the default registry(docker.io). Detail Q&A can refer following,
